attributes.action: Allow workers to receive full pay while in self-isolation
attributes.additional_details: It’ll mean more people will self-isolate and many people won’t want to self-isolate as statutory sick pay is too little money and isn’t sustainable for two weeks
attributes.background: Pay companies to allow them to fully pay workers while in self isolation

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
